thread.title: #Saltbae Is the Sensual Food Meme of Your Dreams
thread.title_full: #Saltbae Is the Sensual Food Meme of Your Dreams

author: Tim Forster
title: #Saltbae Is the Sensual Food Meme of Your Dreams
text: #Saltbae Is the Sensual Food Meme of Your Dreams A Turkish butcher’s flamboyant salting style has catapulted him to fame share @nusr_et/Instagram On the surface, he’s just a good-looking man from Turkey, but to the internet hivemind he has proven to be much, much more. Nusret Gökçe is a 32-year-old butcher and restaurateur with six restaurants across Turkey bearing his name (Nusr-Et). But what you really need to know about is the ridiculous flair with which he appears to do just about anything — especially handling meat. Here he is preparing some meat for his new Dubai restaurant, while shunning anything resembling chef-adjacent attire in favor of an elegant t-shirt and suit vest combo — not to mention the impeccable facial hair situation and perfectly on-trend sunglasses. A video posted by nusr_et (@nusr_et) on Oct 13, 2016 at 6:27am PDT His unique salting style seems to have captured the internet’s collective imagination, resulting in the moniker/hashtag Saltbae, while also spawning multiple copycats.
